title: Prawn and pepper stir-fry
time: Takes 5 minutes to make, 15-20 minutes to cook
description: This quick prawn recipe is low in calories and a good source of B vitamins.

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan and cook the cumin and mustard seeds until the mustard seeds start to pop. Add the onion and stir-fry for 2 minutes.

method.Step 2: Add the remaining vegetables, hot vegetable stock and soy sauce, and toss well. Cover and leave to steam-fry for 8-10 minutes.

method.Step 3: Add the king prawns and coriander and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until the prawns are hot. Serve sprinkled with the toasted sesame seeds.
